name: GetMailchimpCampaignFeedback
description:
Retrieve feedback comments for a Mailchimp campaign.

Use this tool to get team feedback for a specific Mailchimp campaign by providing the campaign ID.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific Mailchimp campaign from which to retrieve feedback.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: include_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of specific fields to return, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: fields_to_exclude
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the feedback data, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
